info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 3:41PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Rabun and central Oconee Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 341 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southeast of Clayton, or 7 miles northeast of Tallulah Gorge State Park, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Walhalla, Westminster, Oconee State Park, Mountain Rest and Long Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
